meanings.definition: Located on or relating to the side of a synapse that receives a nerve impulse.
meanings.sent1: The postsynaptic neuron received the signal from the presynaptic cell.
meanings.sent2: The postsynaptic connection is crucial for transmitting information between neurons.
meanings.sent3: The postsynaptic party was where all the messages from the presynaptic guests gathered.
meanings.sent4: Her mind acted like a postsynaptic switchboard, processing incoming signals with precision.
meanings.sent5: The postsynaptic area lit up with activity as the nerve impulse passed through.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the neuron or nerve cell that receives a signal from a presynaptic cell.
meanings.sent1: The postsynaptic neuron responded to the message sent by the presynaptic cell.
meanings.sent2: Postsynaptic neurons play a vital role in signal transmission within the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The postsynaptic neuron eagerly awaited the arrival of the presynaptic signal.
meanings.sent4: His brain functioned like a postsynaptic receiver, processing information with accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The postsynaptic cell was like a catcher, ready to receive the signal thrown by the presynaptic cell.
